.. _module-pw_stream-py:

-------------
Python Stream
-------------
.. pigweed-module-subpage::
   :name: pw_stream

The ``pw_stream`` Python package provides utilities to read and write serial
interfaces.

pw_stream.stream_readers
========================

  :members:

    DataReaderAndExecutor,
    SelectableReader,
    SerialReader,
    SocketReader,
    SocketSubprocess,
